snippet: In poor countries, simple plastic bags are an alternative to the sterile plastic wrap used to regulate the body temperature of very premature babies in the United States, a study suggests.
abstract: Study in journal Pediatrics reports that swaddling premature babies in plastic wrap to keep their body temperature from dropping dangerously, technique common in United States, can be duplicated cheaply and effectively in poorer countries using common plastic bags.
lead_paragraph: In poor countries, simple plastic bags are an alternative to the sterile plastic wrap used to regulate the body temperature of very premature babies in the United States, a study suggests.

headline.seo: Plastic Bags to Keep Premature Babies Warm
headline.main: Plastic Bags to Keep Premature Babies Warm
headline.print_headline: Plastic Bags to Keep Premature Babies Warm
